    Brihi Joshi won the Judge’s Choice Best Poster Award for the work done on Collusive Retweeter Detection with Tanmoy Chakraborty, Hridoy Sankar Dutta and Aditya Chetan at the Research AI Day held at IIM Bangalore and co-organised by IBM India Research Lab. This work on Collusion detection on Twitter fit extremely well with the theme of Research AI Day - “Usable AI”.

    Congratulations Dr. Tanmoy Chakraborty on getting your project proposal accepted in SERB-IMPRINT scheme. He will lead the project as a Co-PI along with Dr. Maya Ramanath (PI) and Dr. Srikanta Bedathur (Co-PI) from IIT Delhi. The project will attempts to design AI-enabled assistive technology for smart searching and browsing online educational content. VideoKen will support them as an Industry partner.
